imdb.title: Freezing
imdb.plot: Earth in the near future has become threatened by other dimensional beings called the NOVA. The only way to defeat these creatures has turned out to be by using genetically altered girls (Pandora's). They are paired up with boys (...

episodes.title: Untouchable Queen
episodes.plot: Satellizer el Bridget is the top-ranked Pandora at the West Genetics academy, but her status as the "Untouchable Queen" is jeopardized by a strange encounter with young Kazuya Aoi.

episodes.title: Pandora Mode
episodes.plot: Kazuya's attempt to apologize to Satellizer is interrupted by the arrival of Ganessa, who appears eager for a rematch. When the poor boy gets caught up in the battle, Satellizer reveals a fierce new ability!

episodes.title: Accelerating Turn
episodes.plot: Kazuya gets caught up in a catfight between Satellizer and a cold-hearted classmate who collects Limiters. When his Untouchable Queen is humiliated by her sultry attacker, Kazuya shockingly unleashes his true powers!

episodes.title: Tempest Turn
episodes.plot: When Satellizer is challenged to a duel by the powerful "Protector of Order", she is given twenty-four hours to find a Limiter - or she will be forced to face her latest foe alone.

episodes.title: She is Rana Linchen
episodes.plot: Kazuya is attacked by three sadistic Pandoras while on his way to Satellizer's room for a private celebration of their new union. When his powers suddenly vanish, he'll need help from a new friend to survive the night!

episodes.title: Machination
episodes.plot: A manipulative upperclassman uses Rana and Satellizer's mutual affection for Kazuya to lure the two powerful Pandoras into a blood-spilling, clothes-shredding fight to the death!

episodes.title: Sanction
episodes.plot: Realizing they've been tricked, Rana and Satellizer join forces in an attempt to turn the tables on their attackers. The battle rages out of control until a painful flashback triggers a powerful outburst from Satellizer!

episodes.title: Pandora Queen
episodes.plot: Kazuya must decide between escorting Rana or Satellizer to the big dance, and the untouchable queen gets a taste of the spotlight when she enters a Pandora beauty pageant!

episodes.title: Godspeed of the East
episodes.plot: Kazuya meets a Pandora who carries the essence of his dead sister, and East Genetics Academy is attacked by four Novas with unprecedented abilities!

episodes.title: Nova Form
episodes.plot: Satellizer confronts Kazuya over his interest in becoming her Limiter, and the Nova turn fallen Pandoras into an unstoppable attack force headed straight for the precious Ravensborne Nucleochede.

episodes.title: Ambush! Ravensborne Nucloechede
episodes.plot: As the slave Nova-Pandora hybrids approach the Ravensborne Nucleochede, Satellizer and her comrades stage a desperate last stand in order to protect the source of their power.

episodes.title: Satellizer vs Pandora
episodes.plot: In the heat of battle, Satellizer pushes her powers to unnatural levels, putting her at risk of being possessed by the Nova. To survive, she'll need help Kazuya, her fellow Pandoras, and one of their fallen comrades!

episodes.title: OVA 1: I Want to Touch Her - Satellizer, the Girl with Glasses
episodes.plot: Satellizer, having caught a cold, sneezes and accidentally stops her Volt Texture. Kazuya is seen looking on, having been beaten half to death by Ganessa. Rana suddenly enters, apparently starting to play with Satellizer's body. However, she notices Kazuya showing more interest in Satellizer and disables her own Volt Texture. Ganessa and Arthur become jealous, and Ganessa also disables her Volt Texture with the intention of attacking Rana. However, it appears that they have all caught Satellizer's cold...

episodes.title: OVA 2: So Many Secrets - First Room Entry
episodes.plot: In the public baths, Arnett, Creo, Attia and Ingrid ask Satellizer if she has already invited Kazuya to her room. When she reveals she hasn't as she does not know what to do next, the girls sneak Kazuya inside and decides "to teach" Satellizer. However, Elizabeth arrives and chastises the girls for trying to teach Satellizer since their first time of inviting their Limiters weren't perfect either. As they ask Elizabeth to teach them properly, Chiffon arrives and falls on the floor laughing over the girls' talk while an embarrassed Kazuya is ignored.

episodes.title: OVA 3: They'll See - The Far-Too-Stimulating Bodily Measurement
episodes.plot: The girls are having their body measurement check-up, where Rana shows her ability to correctly guess the breast size of the girls by groping them as she demonstrates it on Kaho, Ganessa, Satellizer, Chiffon and Ticy. Attia, who has an inferiority complex due to her smaller breasts, refuses to join until Chiffon decides to do the "examination" on her. Unknown to the girls, the boys are secretly listening from outside.

episodes.title: OVA 5: Don't Look - Pandora Changing in the Flesh
episodes.plot: The Pandora's do some gymnastics with the energetic boys watching and cheering on the sexy routines.

episodes.title: OVA 6: Freezing Run Amuck - So Many Sighs from Our Older Sisters
episodes.plot: During a training exercise Kazuya freezes the girls which causes both pleasure and pain
